GP12sivap7_u:2292: śamaṃ jagāma saṃprīto gaṇapastasya gauravāt // ŚivP_7.1,23.6cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2296: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya yajñahantre triśūline // ŚivP_7.1,23. 8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2299: devatānāṃ śirohantre dakṣasya ca durātmanaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2301: śāsitāḥ samare vīra tvayā vayamaninditā // ŚivP_7.1,23.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2302: dagdhāścāmī vayaṃ sarve tvatto bhītāśca bho prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2305: tuṣṭastvevaṃ stuto devān visṛjya nigaḍātprabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2307: devopi tatra bhagavānantarikṣe sthitaḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2309: taṃ dṛṣṭvā parameśānaṃ devā viṣṇupurogamāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2310: prītā api ca bhītāśca namaścakrurmaheśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,23.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2312: idamāha mahādevaḥ prahasan prekṣya pārvatīm // ŚivP_7.1,23.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2314: mābhaiṣṭa tridaśāssarve yūyaṃ vai māmikāḥ prajāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2317: kruddheṣvasmāsu yuṣmākaṃ na sthitirna ca jīvitam // ŚivP_7.1,23.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2324: tvameva devākhilalokakartā pātā ca hartā parameśvaro 'si // ŚivP_7.1,23.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2328: caṃdro 'gado hi deveśa kṛpātastava śaṃkara // ŚivP_7.1,23.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2330: sīmantinī hatadhavā tava pūjanataḥ prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2332: śrīkarāya dadau devaḥ svīyaṃ padamanuttamam // ŚivP_7.1,23.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2334: meduraṃ tārayāmāsa sadāraṃ ca ghṛṇānidhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2335: śāradāṃ vidhavāṃ cakre sadhavāṃ kriyayā bhavān // ŚivP_7.1,23.25cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2336: bhadrāyuṣo vipattiṃ ca vicchidya tvamadāḥ sukham // ŚivP_7.1,23.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2341: kartā pātā tathā hartā janānugrahakāṃkṣayā // ŚivP_7.1,23.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2344: tvattaḥ sarvaṃ ca tvaṃ sarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ girīśvara // ŚivP_7.1,23.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2345: trāhi trāhi punastrāhi kṛpāṃ kuru mamopari // ŚivP_7.1,23.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2347: evaṃ tvavasaraṃ prāpya vyajñāpayata śūline // ŚivP_7.1,23.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2351: labdhamāno bhaviṣyaṃti ye purā nihitā mṛdhe // ŚivP_7.1,23.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2359: prathamādyaiśca yā devyo daṃḍitā devamātaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2361: dakṣasya bhagavāneva svayaṃ brahmā pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2363: so 'pi saṃjñāṃ tato labdhvā sa dṛṣṭvā jīvitaḥ sudhī // ŚivP_7.1,23.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2364: bhītaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ śaṃbhuṃ tuṣṭāva pralapanbahu // ŚivP_7.1,23.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2367: kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ me kṣamasva ha // ŚivP_7.1,23.39cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2368: kartā bhartā ca hartā ca tvameva jagatāṃ prabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2370: tvayaiva vitataṃ sarvaṃ vyāptaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ na nāśitam // ŚivP_7.1,23.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2373: taṃ tathā vyākulaṃ bhītaṃ pralapaṃtaṃ kṛtāgasam // ŚivP_7.1,23.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2377: tato brahmādayo devā abhivaṃdya kṛta 2aṃjaliḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2378: tuṣṭuvuḥ praśrayā vācā śaṃkaraṃ girijādhipam // ŚivP_7.1,23.44cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2380: jaya śaṃkara deveśa dīnānātha mahāprabho // ŚivP_7.1,23.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2384: kṛpāṃ kuru maheśānāparādhaṃ no kṣamasva vai // ŚivP_7.1,23.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2386: kṛpāṃ kuru maśānāparādhaṃ naḥ kṣamasva vai // ŚivP_7.1,23.46cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2388: duṣṭadaṇḍaprada svāminkṛpāṃ kuru namo 'stu te // ŚivP_7.1,23.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2389: tvaṃ prabho garvahartā vai duṣṭānāṃ tvāmajānatām // ŚivP_7.1,23.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2390: rakṣako hi viśeṣeṇa satāṃ tvatsaktacetasām // ŚivP_7.1,23.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2391: adbhutaṃ caritaṃ te hi niścitaṃ kṛpayā tava // ŚivP_7.1,23.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2394: iti stuto mahādevo brahmādyairamaraiḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2397: dadau narāṃśca suprītyā śaṃkaro dīnavatsalaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2398: sa ca tatastridaśāñcharaṇāgatān paramakāruṇikaḥ parameśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2402: śaraṇameva gatānavalokya vastadakhilaṃ kila vismṛtameva naḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2403: tadiha yūyamapi prakṛtaṃ manasyavigaṇayya vimardamapatrapāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2404: hariviriṃcisurendramukhāssukhaṃ vrajata devapuraṃ prati saṃprati // ŚivP_7.1,23.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2407: atha surā api te vigatavyathāḥ kathitabhadrasubhadraparākramāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2408: sapadi khena sukhena yathāsukhaṃ yayuranekamukhāḥ maghavanmukhāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,23.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2409: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe giriśānunayo nāma trayoviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:2412: antardhānagato devyā saha sānucaro haraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2413: kva yātaḥ kutra vāsaḥ kiṃ kṛtvā virarāma ha // ŚivP_7.1,24.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2417: tapo mahatkṛtaṃ tena voḍhuṃ svaśirasā śivau // ŚivP_7.1,24.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2425: ata eva hi devena devyāḥ priyacikīrṣayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2439: darpaṇe dehasaubhāgyaṃ draṣṭukāma iva sthitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2446: parītaḥ sarvato dikṣu bhramanniva vihāyasi // ŚivP_7.1,24.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2455: tatra tatra niṣaṇṇābhyāṃ śivābhyāṃ saphalīkṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2456: tamimaṃ sarvataḥ śreṣṭhaṃ smṛtvā sāmbastriyambakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2460: tathā gateṣu kāleṣu pravṛddhāsu prajāsu ca // ŚivP_7.1,24.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2462: tābhyāṃ tapo balāddattaṃ brahmaṇā parameṣṭinā // ŚivP_7.1,24.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2464: ayonijā tu yā kanyā hyaṃbikāṃśasamudbhavā // ŚivP_7.1,24.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2466: tayā tu nau vadhaḥ saṃkhye tasyāṃ kāmābhibhūtayoḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2467: iti cābhyarthito brahmā tābhyāmprāha tathāstviti // ŚivP_7.1,24.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2468: tataḥ prabhṛti śakrādīnvijitya samare surān // ŚivP_7.1,24.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2471: viniṃdyāpi rahasyaṃ vāṃ krodhayitvā yathā tathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2476: kālītyāha rahasyaṃ vāṃ nindayanniva sasmitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2477: tataḥ kruddhā tadā devī suvarṇā varṇakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,24.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2480: īdṛśo mama varṇesminna ratirbhavato 'sti cet // ŚivP_7.1,24.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2481: evāvantaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ kathameṣā niyamyate // ŚivP_7.1,24.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2482: aratyā vartamāno 'pi kathaṃ ca ramase mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2485: iti hetoḥ smaro yasmātprasabhaṃ bhasmasātkṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2486: yā ca nābhimatā bharturapi sarvāṃgasundarī // ŚivP_7.1,24.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2487: sā vṛthaiva hi jāyeta sarvairapi guṇāntaraiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2488: bharturbhogaikaśeṣo hi sarga evaiṣa yoṣitām // ŚivP_7.1,24.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2490: tasmādvarṇamimaṃ tyaktvā tvayā rahasi ninditam // ŚivP_7.1,24.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2491: varṇāntaraṃ bhajiṣye vā na bhajiṣyāmi vā svayam // ŚivP_7.1,24.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2494: tathā praṇayabhaṃgena bhīto bhūtapatiḥ svayam // ŚivP_7.1,24.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2497: ajānatī ca krīḍoktiṃ priye kiṃ kupitāsi me // ŚivP_7.1,24.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2498: ratiḥ kuto vā jāyeta tvattaścedaratirmama // ŚivP_7.1,24.41cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2503: pṛthagjanānāṃ rataye kāmātmā kalpito mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.44ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2505: māṃ vai tridaśasāmānyaṃ manyamāno manobhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2510: krodhasya janakaṃ vākyaṃ hṛdi kṛtvedamabravīt // ŚivP_7.1,24.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2512: śrutapūrvaṃ hi bhagavaṃstava cāṭu vaco mayā // ŚivP_7.1,24.48ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2514: prāṇānapyapriyā bharturnārī yā na parityajet // ŚivP_7.1,24.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2515: kulāṃganā śubhā sadbhiḥ kutsitaiva hi gamyate // ŚivP_7.1,24.49cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2516: bhūyasī ca tavāprītiragauramiti me vapuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2522: sa yadyevaṃvidhatāpaste tapasā kiṃ prayojanam // ŚivP_7.1,24.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2523: mamecchayā svecchayā vā varṇāntaravatī bhava // ŚivP_7.1,24.52cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2525: necchāmi bhavato varṇaṃ svayaṃ vā kartumanyathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2526: brahmāṇaṃ tapasārādhya kṣipraṃ gaurī bhavāmyaham // ŚivP_7.1,24.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2529: tamāhūya mahādevi tapasā kiṃ kariṣyasi // ŚivP_7.1,24.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2531: tvatto labdhapadā eva sarve brahmādayaḥ surāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,24.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2533: purā kila satī nāmnā dakṣasya duhitā 'bhavam // ŚivP_7.1,24.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2534: jagatāṃ patimevaṃ tvāṃ patiṃ prāptavatī tathā // ŚivP_7.1,24.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2535: evamadyāpi tapasā toṣayitvā dvijaṃ vidhim // ŚivP_7.1,24.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2536: gaurī bhavitumicchāmi ko doṣaḥ kathyatāmiha // ŚivP_7.1,24.57cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2539: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śivamandaragirinivāsakrīḍoktavarṇanaṃ nāma caturviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:2543: niyamya ca viyogārtiṃ jagāma himavadgirim // ŚivP_7.1,25.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2546: tataḥ svapitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātaraṃ ca tayorgṛhe // ŚivP_7.1,25.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2547: praṇamya vṛttaṃ vijñāpya tābhyāṃ cānumatā satī // ŚivP_7.1,25.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2548: punastapovanaṃ gatvā bhūṣaṇāni visṛjya ca // ŚivP_7.1,25.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2549: snātvā tapasvino veṣaṃ kṛtvā paramapāvanam // ŚivP_7.1,25.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2550: saṃkalpya ca mahātīvraṃ tapaḥ paramaduścaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2552: tameva kṣaṇike liṃge dhyātvā bāhyavidhānataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2554: sa eva brahmaṇo mūrtimāsthāya tapasaḥ phalam // ŚivP_7.1,25.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2556: tathā tapaścarantīṃ tāṃ kāle bahutithe gate // ŚivP_7.1,25.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2560: taṃ dṛṣṭvāpi tathā vyāghraṃ duṣṭabhāvādupāgatam // ŚivP_7.1,25.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2563: mamāmiṣaṃ tato nānyaditi matvā nirantaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.11cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2568: trātā ca duṣṭasattvebhya iti pravavṛte kṛpā // ŚivP_7.1,25.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2570: babhūva sahasā vyāghro devīṃ ca bubudhe tadā // ŚivP_7.1,25.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2571: nyavartata bubhukṣā ca tasyāṃgastambhanaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.1,25.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2572: daurātmyaṃ janmasiddhaṃ ca tṛptiśca samajāyata // ŚivP_7.1,25.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2576: sa eva drāvako bhūtvā vicacāra tapovane // ŚivP_7.1,25.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2580: yathā ca dadatuḥ śumbhaniśumbhau varasammadāt // ŚivP_7.1,25.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2581: so 'pi śrutvā vidhirduḥkhaṃ surāṇāṃ kṛpayānvitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2583: sāmaraḥ prārthito brahmā yayau devyāstapovanam // ŚivP_7.1,25.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2585: dadarśa ca suraśreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhe tapasi niṣṭhitām // ŚivP_7.1,25.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2587: nanāma cāsya jagato mātaraṃ svasya vai hareḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2589: brahmāṇamāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā devī devagaṇaiḥ saha // ŚivP_7.1,25.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2591: tāṃ ca pratyupacāroktiṃ puraskṛtyābhinaṃdya ca // ŚivP_7.1,25.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2594: tīvreṇa tapasānena devyā kimiha sādhyate // ŚivP_7.1,25.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2595: tapaḥphalānāṃ sarveṣāṃ tvadadhīnā hi siddhayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2596: yaścaiva jagatāṃ bhartā tameva parameśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,25.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2597: bhartāramātmanā prāpya prāptañca tapasaḥ phalam // ŚivP_7.1,25.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2599: idantu citraṃ devasya virahaṃ sahase katham // ŚivP_7.1,25.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2601: sargādau bhavato devādutpattiḥ śrūyate yadā // ŚivP_7.1,25.29ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2602: tadā prajānāṃ prathamastvaṃ me prathamajaḥ sutaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2603: yadā punaḥ prajāvṛddhyai lalāṭādbhavato bhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2604: utpanno 'bhūttadā tvaṃ me guruḥ śvaśurabhāvataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2605: yadā bhavadgirīndraste putro mama pitā svayam // ŚivP_7.1,25.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2606: tadā pitāmahastvaṃ me jāto lokapitāmaha // ŚivP_7.1,25.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2608: vṛttavantaḥpure bhartā kathayiṣye kathaṃ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2609: kimatra bahunā dehe yaścāyaṃ mama kālimā // ŚivP_7.1,25.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2613: etāvatā kimarthena tīvraṃ devi tapaḥ kṛtam // ŚivP_7.1,25.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2614: svecchaiva kimaparyāptā krīḍeyaṃ hi tavedṛśī // ŚivP_7.1,25.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2615: krīḍā 'pi ca jaganmātastava lokahitāya vai // ŚivP_7.1,25.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2616: ato mameṣṭamanayā phalaṃ kimapi sādhyatām // ŚivP_7.1,25.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2619: alaṃ vilaṃbanenātra tvaṃ kṣaṇena sthirā bhava // ŚivP_7.1,25.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2622: tvakkośaṃ sahasotsṛjya gaurī sā samajāyata // ŚivP_7.1,25.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2623: sā tvakkośātmanotsṛṣṭā kauśikī nāma nāmataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,25.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2625: sā tu māyātmikā śaktiryoganidrā ca vaiṣṇavī // ŚivP_7.1,25.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2627: saumyā ghorā ca miśrā ca trinetrā candraśekharā // ŚivP_7.1,25.41ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2629: dattā ca brahmaṇe devyā śaktireṣā sanātanī // ŚivP_7.1,25.42ab/

GP12sivap7_u:2989: suvarṇībhūtayā nyastaṃ merau śaravaṇe kvacit // ŚivP_7.1,30.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:2990: saṃdīpayitvā kālena tasya bhāsā diśo daśa // ŚivP_7.1,30.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2992: tataścireṇa kālena saṃjāte tatra tejasi // ŚivP_7.1,30.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:2994: tacchaiśavaṃ svarūpaṃ ca tasya dṛṣṭvā manoharam // ŚivP_7.1,30.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3000: svasya vakṣaḥsthale svairaṃ nartayitvā kumārakam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3001: anubhūya ca tatkrīḍāṃ saṃbhāvya ca parasparam // ŚivP_7.1,30.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3004: svayandevaśca devī ca na tṛptimupajagmatuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3005: tataḥ śakreṇa saṃdhāya bibhyatā tārakāsurāt // ŚivP_7.1,30.42cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3023: śānta eva sadā sarvamanugṛhṇāti cecchivaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,30.51ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3024: sarvāṇi pūrayedeva kathaṃ śaktena mocayet // ŚivP_7.1,30.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3028: yathā hyāśu nivarteta tathā kathaya māruta // ŚivP_7.1,30.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3029: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śivatattvapraśno nāma triṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3033: jijñāsā hi na nāstikyaṃ sādhayetsādhubuddhiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3035: asatāṃ tvanyathābhāvaḥ prasādena vinā prabhoḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3037: na kiṃcidapi kartavyamiti sādhu viniścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3052: na hyasau niṣkalaḥ sākṣācchivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3059: evaṃ śivo 'pi mūrtyātmanyanārūḍha iti sthitiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3062: ata eva hi pūjādau mūrtyātmaparikalpanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3063: mūrtyātmani kṛtaṃ sākṣācchiva eva kṛtaṃ yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3067: tathā mūrtyātmaniṣṭhena śivena paśavo vayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3070: ātmanāmeva bhogāya mokṣāya ca viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3073: na ca karma śivo 'stīti tasya bhogaḥ kimātmakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.21cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3074: sarvaṃ śivo 'nugṛhṇāti na nigṛhṇāti kiṃcana // ŚivP_7.1,31.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3075: nigṛhṇatāṃ tu ye doṣāśśive teṣāmasaṃbhavāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3078: brahmāṇḍasyādhipatyaṃ hi śrīkaṇṭhasya na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3080: sadoṣā eva devādyā nigṛhītā yathoditam // ŚivP_7.1,31.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3082: nigraho 'pi svarūpeṇa viduṣāṃ na jugupsitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3083: ata eva hi daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍo rājñāṃ praśasyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3085: na sa cedīśatāṃ kuryājjagataḥ kathamīśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3086: īśecchā ca vidhātṛtvaṃ vidherājñāpanaṃ param // ŚivP_7.1,31.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3089: viparītasamādhoḥ syānna sarvaṃ tattu dṛśyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3091: nivartate ca sāmāderaṃte daṇḍo hi sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,31.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3095: sa kathaṃ duṣyate sadbhirasatāmeva nigrahāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3098: sarvo 'pi nigraho loke na ca vidveṣapūrvakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3099: na hi dveṣṭi pitā putraṃ yo nigṛhyāti śikṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3102: anyathā na hinastyeva sadoṣānapyasau parān // ŚivP_7.1,31.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3104: tasmādduḥkhātmikāṃ hiṃsāṃ kurvāṇo yaḥ sanirghṛṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3106: iti nirbaṃdhayaṃtyeke niyamo neti cāpare // ŚivP_7.1,31.37cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3107: nidānajñasya bhiṣajo rugṇo hiṃsāṃ prayuṃjataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3108: na kiṃcidapi nairghṛṇyaṃ ghṛṇaivātra prayojikā // ŚivP_7.1,31.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3109: ghṛṇāpi na guṇāyaiva hiṃsreṣu pratiyogiṣu // ŚivP_7.1,31.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3115: tasmād ghṛṇā guṇāyaiva sarvatheti na saṃmatam // ŚivP_7.1,31.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3117: mūrtyātmasvapi rāgādyā doṣāḥ santyeva vastutaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3118: tathāpi teṣāmevaite na śivasya tu sarvathā // ŚivP_7.1,31.43cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3119: agnāvapi samāviṣṭaṃ tāmraṃ khalu sakālikam // ŚivP_7.1,31.43ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3123: evaṃ śodhyātmasaṃsargānna hyaśuddhaḥ śivo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3127: na hi kāṣṭhaṃ jvalatyūrdhvamagnireva jvalatyasau // ŚivP_7.1,31.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3132: tairguṇairuparaktānāṃ doṣāya ca guṇāya ca // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3134: na guṇāya na doṣāya śivasya guṇavṛttayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.50ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3136: saṃsāramocanaṃ kiṃ tu śaivamājñāmayaṃ hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.51cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3141: hite sadā niyuktaṃ tu sarvaṃ cidacidātmakam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3142: svabhāvapratibandhaṃ tatsamaṃ na labhate hitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3143: yathā vikāsayatyeva raviḥ padmāni bhānubhiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3145: svabhāvo 'pi hi bhāvānāṃ bhāvino 'rthasya kāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3146: na hi svabhāvo naśyantamarthaṃ kartṛṣu sādhayet // ŚivP_7.1,31.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3150: yadyathā bhavituṃ yogyaṃ tattathā na bhavetsvayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3151: vinā bhāvanayā kartā svatantrassantato bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,31.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3154: anyathā saṃsarantyete niyamānna śivaḥ katham // ŚivP_7.1,31.60ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3157: sa heturātmanāmeva nijo nāgantuko malaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.61cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3158: āgantukatve kasyāpi bhāvyaṃ kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.1,31.62ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3160: ātmatāyāḥ samatve 'pi baddhā muktāḥ pare yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.63ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3164: mūrtyātmasu śivāḥ kecidadhvanāṃ mūrdhasu sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.65ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3171: śāntyatītapade śaivāḥ śānte māheśvare tataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.68cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3172: vidyāyāntu yathā raudrāḥ pratiṣṭhāyāṃ tu vaiṣṇavāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3173: nivṛttau ca tathātmāno brahmā brahmāṃgayonayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.69cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3177: yathāmabhāvo muktasya pūrvaṃ paścāttu pakvatā // ŚivP_7.1,31.71cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3179: āme tvadharatā puṃsāṃ pakve tūttaratā kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.72cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3181: atrottarā ekamalā dvimalā madhyamā matāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.73cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3195: pṛthivīpada ityevaṃ devā devavrataiḥ stutā // ŚivP_7.1,31.79cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3198: asya rogasya bhaiṣajyaṃ jñānameva na cāparam // ŚivP_7.1,31.81ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3201: kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ karotīti nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // ŚivP_7.1,31.82cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3202: duḥkhameva hi sarvo 'pi saṃsāra iti niścitam // ŚivP_7.1,31.83ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3204: na hi rogī hyarogī syādbhiṣagbhaiṣajyakāraṇāt // ŚivP_7.1,31.84ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3208: na bhiṣakkāraṇaṃ roge śivaḥ saṃsārakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.86ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3209: ityetadapi vaiṣamyaṃ na doṣāyāsya kalpate // ŚivP_7.1,31.86cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3211: svābhāviko malaḥ puṃsāṃ sa hi saṃsārayatyamūn // ŚivP_7.1,31.87cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3216: na nivartayituṃ śakyaṃ sānnidhyaṃ sadakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,31.90ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3218: na śivena vinā kiṃcitpravṛttamiha vidyate // ŚivP_7.1,31.91ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3219: tatpreritamidaṃ sarvaṃ tathāpi na sa muhyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.91cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3221: tayā tatamidaṃ śaśvattathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.92cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3222: anidaṃ prathamaṃ sarvamīśitavyaṃ sa īśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.93ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3223: īśanācca tadīyājñā tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.93cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3224: yo 'nyathā manyate mohātsa vinaṣyati durmatiḥ // ŚivP_7.1,31.94ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3225: tacchaktivaibhavādeva tathāpi sa na duṣyati // ŚivP_7.1,31.94cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3229: munayo vismayāviṣṭāḥ preṇemuḥ pavanaṃ prabhum // ŚivP_7.1,31.96cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3238: nāparokṣādṛte mokṣa iti kṛtvā viniścayam // ŚivP_7.1,31.100ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3240: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe jñānopadeśo nāmaikatriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3244: tattasya sādhanaṃ cādya vaktumarhasi māruta // ŚivP_7.1,32.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3246: śaivo hi paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3248: sa tu pañcavidho jñeyaḥ pañcabhiḥ parvabhiḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.1,32.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3250: taireva sottaraissiddho dharmastu paramo mataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3251: parokṣamaparokṣaṃ ca jñānaṃ yatra ca mokṣadam // ŚivP_7.1,32.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3258: sa cāyaṃ paramo dharmaḥ paradharmasya sādhanam // ŚivP_7.1,32.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3260: śaivo yaḥ paramo dharmaḥ śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānaśabditaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3264: śaivāgamo hi dvividhaḥ śrauto 'śrautaśca saṃskṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3266: svataṃtro daśadhā pūrvaṃ tathāṣṭādaśadhā punaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3269: paraṃ pāśupataṃ yatra vrataṃ jñānaṃ ca kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3274: te ca pāśupatā jñeyāssaṃhitānāṃ pravartakāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3277: teṣu pāśupato yogaḥ śivaṃ pratyakṣayeddṛḍham // ŚivP_7.1,32.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3279: tatrāpyupāyako yukto brahmaṇā sa tu kathyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3281: tena yogena sahasā śaivī prajñā prajāyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3284: prasīdati śivastasya yasya jñānaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // ŚivP_7.1,32.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3285: prasādātparamo yogo yaḥ śivaṃ cāparokṣayet // ŚivP_7.1,32.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3287: tataḥ syānmuktasaṃsāro muktaḥ śivasamo bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,32.22ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3288: brahmaprokta ityupāyaḥ sa eva pṛthagucyate // ŚivP_7.1,32.22cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3289: śivo maheśvaraścaiva rudro viṣṇuḥ pitāmahaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.23ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3295: padameva hi tannityamanityāḥ padinaḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3296: padānāṃ pratikṛttau tu mucyante padino yataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.26cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3306: prakṛtestu paraṃ prāhuḥ puruṣaṃ pañcaviṃśakam // ŚivP_7.1,32.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3309: tasya prakṛtilīnasya yaḥ parassa maheśvaraḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3312: māyāntu prakṛtiṃ vidyānmāyinaṃ tu maheśvaram // ŚivP_7.1,32.34cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3314: kālātmā paramātmādiḥ sthūlaḥ sūkṣmaḥ prakīrtitaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3315: rudduḥkhaṃ duḥkhaheturvā tadrāvayati naḥ prabhuḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.36ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3316: rudra ityucyate sadbhiḥ śivaḥ paramakāraṇam // ŚivP_7.1,32.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3321: nidānajño yathā vaidyo rogasya vinivartakaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3327: aṇavo naiva jānanti māyayaiva malāvṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.42ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3339: chittvā paryaṣṭakākāraṃ svātmānaṃ ca suṣumṇayā // ŚivP_7.1,32.47cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3348: dhyātvā hi mānase devaṃ svasthacitto 'tha mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3350: abhyarcanānte tu punaḥ prāṇānāyamya mānavaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3351: samyakcittaṃ samādhāya śārvaṃ nāmāṣṭakaṃ japet // ŚivP_7.1,32.53cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3355: evaṃ kṛtvā cirādeva jñānaṃ pāśupataṃ śubham // ŚivP_7.1,32.55cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3356: labhate tatpratiṣṭhāṃ ca vṛttaṃ cānuttamaṃ tathā // ŚivP_7.1,32.56ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3357: yogaṃ ca paramaṃ labdhvā mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,32.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3358: iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāṃ pūrvakhaṇḍe śreṣṭhānuṣṭhānavarṇanaṃ nāma dvātriṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:3362: brahmādayo 'pi yatkṛtvā sarve pāśupatāḥ smṛtāḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.1cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3368: tatra pūrvaṃ trayodaśyāṃ susnātaḥ sukṛtāhnikaḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3369: anujñāpya svamācāryaṃ saṃpūjya praṇipatya ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3370: pūjāṃ vaiśeṣikīṃ kṛtvā śuklāṃbaradharaḥ svayam // ŚivP_7.1,33.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3372: darbhāsane samāsīno darbhamuṣṭiṃ pragṛhya ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3375: dhyātvā devaṃ ca devīṃ ca tadvijñāpanavartmanā // ŚivP_7.1,33.6ef/
GP12sivap7_u:3378: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsadvādaśakaṃ tu vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.8ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3379: tadardhaṃ vā tadardhaṃ vā māsamekamathāpi vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3383: hutvājyena samidbhiśca caruṇā ca yathākramam // ŚivP_7.1,33.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3391: rāgo vidyākale caiva niyatiḥ kāla eva ca // ŚivP_7.1,33.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3392: māyā ca śuddhividyā ca maheśvarasadāśivau // ŚivP_7.1,33.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3393: śaktiśca śivatattvaṃ ca tattvāni kramaśo viduḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3394: mantraistu virajairhutvā hotāsau virajā bhavet // ŚivP_7.1,33.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3397: vinyasyāgnau ca samprokṣya dine tasminhaviṣyabhuk // ŚivP_7.1,33.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3398: prabhāte tu caturdaśyāṃ kṛtvā sarvaṃ puroditam // ŚivP_7.1,33.18ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3399: dine tasminnirāhāraḥ kālaṃ śeṣaṃ samāpayet // ŚivP_7.1,33.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:3400: prātaḥ parvaṇi cāpyevaṃ kṛtvā homā vasānataḥ // ŚivP_7.1,33.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:3402: tataśca jaṭilo muṇḍī śikhaikajaṭa eva vā // ŚivP_7.1,33.20ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5042: praṇītamamalaṃ vākyaṃ tatpramāṇaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,12.24ef/

GP12sivap7_u:5054: praṇīto vimalo mantro na tena sadṛśaḥ kvacit // ŚivP_7.2,12.30cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5071: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe pañcākṣaramāhātmyavarṇanaṃ nāma dvādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:5074: kalau kaluṣite kāle durjaye duratikrame // ŚivP_7.2,13.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5077: sarvādhikāre saṃdigdhe niścite vāpi paryaye // ŚivP_7.2,13.2cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5082: bhaktyā ca bhāvitātmāno mucyaṃte kalijā narāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.4cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5118: mama pañcākṣare maṃtre tasmācchreṣṭhataro hi saḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5120: tiṣṭhaṃti śāśvatā dharmā devāssarvamidaṃ jagat // ŚivP_7.2,13.21cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5157: prathamaṃ manmukhodgīrṇā sā mamaivāsti vācikā // ŚivP_7.2,13.40ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5170: vāmadevo nāma ṛṣiḥ paṃktiśchanda udāhṛtam // ŚivP_7.2,13.46ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5171: devatā śiva evāhaṃ mantrasyāsya varānane // ŚivP_7.2,13.46cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5175: indro rudro harirbrahmā skaṃdasteṣāṃ ca devatāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5176: mama pañcamukhānyāhuḥ sthāne teṣāṃ varānane // ŚivP_7.2,13.49ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5179: pañcamaḥ svaritaścaiva tṛtīyo nihataḥ smṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.50cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5193: yena kenāpi vā devi pūjā muktiṃ nayiṣyate // ŚivP_7.2,13.57cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5196: tathāpi mama bhaktā ye nātyaṃtavivaśāḥ punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.59ab/
GP12sivap7_u:5197: teṣāṃ sarveṣu śāstreṣu mayeva niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,13.59cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5211: vācā ca manasā caiva kāyena draviṇena ca // ŚivP_7.2,14.4cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5229: anugṛhya tato dadyājjñānaṃ mama yathāvidhi // ŚivP_7.2,14.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5232: śivaṃ cāstu śubhaṃ cāstu śobhano 'stu priyo 'stviti // ŚivP_7.2,14.15ab/

GP12sivap7_u:5237: ananyastatparo bhūtvā sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // ŚivP_7.2,14.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:5239: naktāśī saṃyamī yassa pauraścaraṇikaḥ smṛtaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.18cd/

GP12sivap7_u:5244: udaṅmukhaḥ prāṅmukho vā maunī caikāgramānasaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,14.21ab/

GP12sivap7_u:6684: vṛttaṃ vā caturasraṃ vā kuryādvediṃ ca maṇḍalam // ŚivP_7.2,27.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6690: mekhalānāṃ trayaṃ vāpi dvayamekamathāpi vā // ŚivP_7.2,27.6cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6691: yathāśobhaṃ prakurvīta ślakṣṇamiṣṭaṃ mṛdā sthiram // ŚivP_7.2,27.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6696: notsedhaniyamo vedyāḥ sā mārdī vātha saikatī // ŚivP_7.2,27.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6702: arcanārthaṃ ca homārthaṃ sarvadravyāṇi sādhayet // ŚivP_7.2,27.12cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6707: anyaṃ vābhyarhitaṃ vahniṃ tataḥ sādhāramānayet // ŚivP_7.2,27.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6710: yonimārgeṇa vā tadvadātmanaḥ saṃmukhena vā // ŚivP_7.2,27.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6711: niyogaḥ pradeśa sarvaṃ kuṃḍaṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6713: nirgamya pāvake bahye līnaṃ biṃbākṛti smaret // ŚivP_7.2,27.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6717: nyasya mantraṃ ghṛte mudrāṃ darśayeddhenusaṃjñitām // ŚivP_7.2,27.19ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6718: sruksruvau taijasau grāhyau na kāṃsyāyasasaisakau // ŚivP_7.2,27.19cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6719: yajñadārumayau vāpi smārtau vā śilpasammatau // ŚivP_7.2,27.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6720: parṇe vā brahmavṛkṣāderacchidre madhya utthite // ŚivP_7.2,27.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6721: saṃsṛjya darbhaistau vahnau saṃtāpya prokṣayetpunaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.21ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6727: raktāgneyī nairṛtī ca kṛṣṇānyā suprabhā matā // ŚivP_7.2,27.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6731: raṃ vahnayeti svāheti madhye hutvāhutitrayam // ŚivP_7.2,27.26ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6733: evaṃ kṛte śivāgniḥ syātsmarettatra śivāsanam // ŚivP_7.2,27.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6736: tāḥ pālāśyaḥ parā vāpi yājñiyā dvādaśāṃgulāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.28ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6737: avakrā na svayaṃ śuṣkāssatvaco nirvraṇāḥ samāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6739: prādeśamātrā vālābhe hotavyāḥ sakalā api // ŚivP_7.2,27.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6744: daśaivāhutayastatra pañca vā tritayaṃ ca vā // ŚivP_7.2,27.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6747: tatra divyena hotavyaṃ tīrthenārṣeṇa vā tathā // ŚivP_7.2,27.33cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6751: tato homaviśiṣṭena ghṛtenāpūrya vai srucam // ŚivP_7.2,27.35ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6752: nidhāya puṣpaṃ tasyāgre śruveṇādhomukhena tām // ŚivP_7.2,27.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6755: itthaṃ pūrṇāhutiṃ kṛtvā pariṣiṃcecca pūrvavat // ŚivP_7.2,27.37ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6756: tata udvāsya deveśaṃ gopayettu hutāśanam // ŚivP_7.2,27.37cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6757: tamapyudvāsya vā nābhau yajetsaṃdhāya nityaśaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6760: anvādhānaṃ punaḥ kṛtvā paridhīn paridhāya ca // ŚivP_7.2,27.39cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6761: pātrāṇi dvandvarūpeṇa nikṣipyeṣṭvā śivaṃ tataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.40ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6767: tripādaṃ saptahastaṃ ca catuḥśṛṃgaṃ dviśīrṣakam // ŚivP_7.2,27.43ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6771: śaktimantaṃ sruksruvau ca dadhānaṃ dakṣiṇe kare // ŚivP_7.2,27.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6772: tomaraṃ tālavṛṃtaṃ ca ghṛtapātraṃ tathetaraiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6774: nālāpanayanaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ saṃśodhya sūtakam // ŚivP_7.2,27.46cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6778: ājyadhārādihomaṃ ca kṛtvā sviṣṭakṛtaṃ tataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.48cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6781: tadastrāṇāṃ ca paritaḥ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathākramam // ŚivP_7.2,27.50ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6785: saṃpūjya devaṃ devīṃ ca tataḥ pūrṇāṃtamācaret // ŚivP_7.2,27.52ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6786: atha vā svāśramoktaṃ tu vahnikarma śivārpaṇam // ŚivP_7.2,27.52cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6787: buddhvā śivāśramī kuryānna ca tatrāparo vidhiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.53ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6789: vaivāhognibhavaṃ vāpi pakvaṃ śuci sugaṃdhi ca // ŚivP_7.2,27.54ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6790: kapilāyāḥ śakṛcchastaṃ gṛhītaṃ gagane patat // ŚivP_7.2,27.54cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6791: na klinnaṃ nātikaṭhinaṃ na durgandhaṃ na śoṣitam // ŚivP_7.2,27.55ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6795: apakvamatipākvaṃ ca saṃtyajya bhasitaṃ sitam // ŚivP_7.2,27.56cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6796: ādāya vā samāloḍya bhasmādhāre vinikṣipet // ŚivP_7.2,27.57ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6797: taijasaṃ dāravaṃ vāpi mṛnmayaṃ śailameva ca // ŚivP_7.2,27.57cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6798: anyadvā śobhanaṃ śuddhaṃ bhasmādhāraṃ prakalpayet // ŚivP_7.2,27.58ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6799: same deśe śubhe śuddhe dhanavadbhasma nikṣipet // ŚivP_7.2,27.58cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6801: na saṃspṛśecca nīcāṃgairnopekṣeta na laṃghayet // ŚivP_7.2,27.59cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6808: atha vidyāsanaṃ nyasya supralipte tu maṇdale // ŚivP_7.2,27.63ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6810: vidyāyāḥ purataḥ kṛtvā gurorapi ca maṇḍalam // ŚivP_7.2,27.64ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6813: tatassvayaṃ ca bhuṃjīta śuddhamannaṃ yathāsukham // ŚivP_7.2,27.65cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6814: niveditaṃ ca vā deve taccheṣaṃ cātmaśuddhaye // ŚivP_7.2,27.66ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6815: śraddadhāno na lobhena na caṇḍāya samarpitam // ŚivP_7.2,27.66cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6817: na tu tatra śivosmīti buddhiṃ kuryādvicakṣaṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.67cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6818: bhuktvācamya śivaṃ dhyātvā hṛdaye mūlamuccaret // ŚivP_7.2,27.68ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6820: rātrau vyatīte pūrvāṃśe kṛtvā pūjāṃ manoharām // ŚivP_7.2,27.69ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6823: manasā karmaṇā vāpi kṛtvā sarvaṃ manoharam // ŚivP_7.2,27.70cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6824: tato devasya devyāśca pādamūle śucissvapet // ŚivP_7.2,27.71ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6825: gṛhastho bhāryayā sārdhaṃ tadanye 'pi tu kevalāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,27.71cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6827: praṇamya manasāṃ devaṃ sāṃbaṃ sagaṇamavyayam // ŚivP_7.2,27.72cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6831: nirvartya śivayoḥ pūjāṃ prārabheta puroditam // ŚivP_7.2,27.74cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6832: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe agnikāryavarṇanaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:6839: aṣṭābhyāṃ ca caturdaśyāṃ tathā parvāṇi ca kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,28.2cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6840: ayane viṣuve caiva grahaṇeṣu viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,28.3ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6841: kartavyā mahatī pūjā hyadhikā vāpi śaktitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,28.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6842: māsimāsi yathānyāyaṃ brahmakūrcaṃ prasādhya tu // ŚivP_7.2,28.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6847: māghe maghākhye nakṣatre pradadyād ghṛtakaṃbalam // ŚivP_7.2,28.6cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6848: phālgune cottarānte vai prārabheta mahotsavam // ŚivP_7.2,28.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6854: śraviṣṭhākhye tu nakṣatre prauṣṭhapadyāṃ tataḥ param // ŚivP_7.2,28.10ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6856: āśvayujyāṃ tato dadyātpāyasaṃ ca navodanam // ŚivP_7.2,28.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6861: āsthānaṃ vā mahāpūjāmadhikaṃ vā samarcanam // ŚivP_7.2,28.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6862: āvṛtte 'pi ca kalyāṇe praśasteṣvapi karmasu // ŚivP_7.2,28.14ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6864: utpāte vāśubhenyasminroge vā prabale 'tha vā // ŚivP_7.2,28.15ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6868: ya evaṃ śarvadharmiṣṭho vartate nityamudyataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,28.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6871: divyaṃ śrīkaṃṭhanāthasya sthānamādyaṃ sa gacchati // ŚivP_7.2,28.18cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6874: saṃprāpya vaiṣṇavaṃ brāhmaṃ rudralokaṃ viśeṣataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,28.20ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6875: tatroṣitvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhuktvā bhogānyathoditān // ŚivP_7.2,28.20cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6885: puṇyakṣaye kṣitiṃ prāpya kule mahati jāyate // ŚivP_7.2,28.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6892: tato labdhvā śivajñānaṃ parāṃ bhaktimavāpya ca // ŚivP_7.2,28.28cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6898: tasmāccchivāśrito bhūtvā yena kenāpi hetunā // ŚivP_7.2,28.31cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6900: nātra nirbaṃdhayiṣyāmo vayaṃ kecana kenacit // ŚivP_7.2,28.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6903: saṃsārakāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ na praroḍhumalaṃ bhavet // ŚivP_7.2,28.34ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6906: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe nityanaimittikavidhivarṇanaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:6916: kiṃcitkriyāmayaṃ karma kiṃcitkarma tapo mayam // ŚivP_7.2,29.4ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6922: atha vakṣyāmi kāmyaṃ hi cehāmutra phalapradam // ŚivP_7.2,29.7cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6925: yathā tathā na bhidyaṃte śaivā māheśvarā api // ŚivP_7.2,29.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6926: śivāśritā hi te śaivā jñānayajñaratā narāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6929: tasmādābhyantare kuryuḥ śaivā māheśvarā vahiḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.10cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6930: na tu prayogo bhidyeta vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6935: ekahastaṃ dvihastaṃ vā maṇḍalaṃ parikalpayet // ŚivP_7.2,29.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6939: daleṣu siddhayaḥ kalpyāḥ kesareṣu saśaktikāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.15cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6941: karṇikāyāṃ ca vairāgyaṃ bījeṣu nava śaktayaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6942: skande śivātmako dharmo nāle jñānaṃ śivāśrayam // ŚivP_7.2,29.17ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6968: ākaṃṭhaṃ vidyayā tadvadālalāṭaṃ tu śāṃtayā // ŚivP_7.2,29.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6980: mūrtimūlena saṃkalpya sakalīkṛtya ca kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,29.35cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6982: mūrtimantaṃ śivaṃ sākṣācchaktyā paramayā saha // ŚivP_7.2,29.36cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6985: brahmabhiśca ṣaḍaṅgaiśca tato mātṛkayā saha // ŚivP_7.2,29.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6986: praṇavena śivenaiva śaktiyuktena ca kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,29.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6987: śāṃtena vā tathānyaiśca vedamantraiśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,29.39ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6988: pūjayetparamaṃ devaṃ kevalena śivena vā // ŚivP_7.2,29.39cd/
GP12sivap7_u:6991: oṃ iti śrīśivamahāpurāṇe saptamyāṃ vāyavīyasaṃhitāyāmuttarakhaṇḍe kāmyakarmavarṇanaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12sivap7_u:6993: tatrādau śivayoḥ pārśve dakṣiṇe vāmataḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.1ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6995: tato brahmāṇi parita īśānādi yathākramam // ŚivP_7.2,30.2ab/
GP12sivap7_u:6998: śivasya ca śivāyāśca vāhneyādi samarcayet // ŚivP_7.2,30.3cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7000: arcayedvā na vā paścātpūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.4cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7001: prathamāvaraṇaṃ proktaṃ mayā te yadunaṃdana // ŚivP_7.2,30.5ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7002: dvitīyāvaraṇaṃ prītyā procyate śraddhayā śṛṇu // ŚivP_7.2,30.5cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7003: anaṃtaṃ pūrvādikpatre tacchaktiṃ tasya vāmataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.6ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7004: sūkṣmaṃ dakṣiṇadikpatre saha śaktyā samarcayet // ŚivP_7.2,30.6cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7005: tataḥ paścimadikpatre saha śaktyā śivottamam // ŚivP_7.2,30.7ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7008: trimūrtiṃ tasya śaktiṃ ca pūjayedagnidigdale // ŚivP_7.2,30.8cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7009: śrīkaṇṭhaṃ nairṛte patre tacchaktiṃ tasya vāmataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.9ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7010: tathaiva mārute patre śikhaṃḍīśaṃ samarcayet // ŚivP_7.2,30.9cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7013: aṣṭasu kramaśo dikṣu pūrvādiparitaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.11ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7015: ugro bhīmo mahādeva ityaṣṭau mūrtayaḥ kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.12ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7019: mahādevaḥ śivo rudraḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.13ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7020: īśāno vijayo bhīmo devadevo bhavodbhavaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.13cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7022: tatrāṣṭau prathamaṃ pūjyāḥ vāhneyādi yathākramam // ŚivP_7.2,30.14cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7025: tasminnāvaraṇe bhūyo vṛṣendraṃ purato yajet // ŚivP_7.2,30.16ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7026: naṃdinaṃ dakṣiṇe tasya mahākālaṃ tathottare // ŚivP_7.2,30.16cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7028: gajāsyaṃ nairṛte patre ṣaṇmukhaṃ vāruṇe punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.17cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7041: evaṃ tṛtīyāvaraṇe vitate pūjite sati // ŚivP_7.2,30.24ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7043: bhānuḥ pūrvadale pūjyo dakṣiṇe caturānanaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.25ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7047: dīptā sūkṣmā jayā bhadrā vibhūtirvimalā kramāt // ŚivP_7.2,30.27ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7048: amoghā vidyutā caiva pūrvādi paritaḥ sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.27cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7052: arko brahmā tathā rudro viṣṇuścaite vivasvataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.29cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7053: vistārā pūrvadigbhāge sutarāṃ dakṣiṇe sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.30ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7054: bodhanī paścime bhāge āpyāyinyuttare punaḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.30cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7055: uṣāṃ prabhāṃ tathā prājñāṃ sandhyāmapi tataḥ param // ŚivP_7.2,30.31ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7057: somamaṃgārakaṃ caiva budhaṃ buddhimatāṃ varam // ŚivP_7.2,30.32ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7058: bṛhaspatiṃ bṛhadbuddhiṃ bhārgavaṃ tejasāṃ nidhim // ŚivP_7.2,30.32cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7059: śanaiścaraṃ tathā rāhuṃ ketuṃ dhūmraṃ bhayaṃkaram // ŚivP_7.2,30.33ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7070: hiraṇyagarbhaṃ pūrvasyāṃ virājaṃ dakṣiṇe tataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.38ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7071: kālaṃ paścimadigbhāge puruṣaṃ cottare yajet // ŚivP_7.2,30.38cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7075: catvāra ete kramaśaḥ prathamāvaraṇe sthitāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.40cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7083: teṣāṃ bhāryāśca taissārdhaṃ pūjanīyā yathākramam // ŚivP_7.2,30.44cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7084: prasūtiśca tathā ' 'kūtiḥ khyātiḥ sambhūtireva ca // ŚivP_7.2,30.45ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7085: dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ kṣamā caiva sannatiścānasūyakā // ŚivP_7.2,30.45cd/
GP12sivap7_u:7086: devamātārundhatī ca sarvāḥ khalu pativratāḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.46ab/
GP12sivap7_u:7091: vaidikyo nikhilā vidyāḥ pūjyā eva samaṃtataḥ // ŚivP_7.2,30.48cd/
